about_the_game:
Ever dreamed of keeping a squishy, bouncy slime alive with the power of pure chaos? Welcome to SlimeXplosion — the ultimate casual game where YOU get to defy gravity, dodge hazards, and turn explosions into your best friend!

In this pulse-pounding, screen-hopping adventure, you’re in control of a super-reactive slime whose only goal is to stay on screen as long as possible. With each passing second, you’ll have to dodge an increasingly chaotic array of hazards — from sharp kites and mischievous rockets to big, bobbing balloons.

Starring:

💥 Explosive Gameplay: Use carefully placed detonations to keep your slime bouncing and safe from danger! Launch your slime upward, sideward, or even backward — just don’t let it fall off the screen!
🎈 Dodge Frenzy: Kites, rockets, and balloons and more are out to push your slime off! Navigate this frantic airspace where every second counts.
🌈 Vibrant Visuals & Bouncy Physics: Satisfyingly stretchy, squishy, and absolutely adorable, your slime brings the screen to life!
🔥 Collect Coins & Unlockables: Gather coins as you dodge and bounce, then use them to unlock new slimes and cool accessories to customize your slime’s style!

How long can you keep your squishy friend afloat?

Get ready to bounce, boom, and blast your way to survival in SlimeXplosion!

short_description: SlimeXplosion is an explosive casual game where you keep an adorable, bouncy slime on-screen for as long as possible! Use powerful detonations to launch your slime up, down, and sideways to avoid falling off the screen while dodging a wild array of hazards like kites, rockets, and balloons.
